p: The analytical standards (97%) used for confirmation and quantification analysis were purchased from Extrasynthese (Genay, France) and Sigma Aldrich (Milan, Italy). 2,6-dimethylphenol was used as an internal standard (99.8%; Sigma Aldrich, Milan, Italy). Solutions of 1% ( w/ v) oil were prepared in hexane for gas chromatography (GC) analysis. Quali-quantitative analyses of the EOs were performed in triplicate, obtained from independent distillation experiments.
